attributes.action: cut the cost of TV licence if the BBC take BBC3 off free view
attributes.additional_details: If the BBC are removing BBC3 from the TV then people who pay TV licence without access to the Internet should get a reduced price as they are losing out on programmes they are paying full price for now, if not then they shouldn't have to pay anything at all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC and the BBC Trust.
